channel.title: Quick question about putting up my server
channel.description:
ok i have all the java and the no ip put i need to know what codes to put in my run server and compiler my ip is trixscape.no-ip.info here is that i have in compiler and run server tell me if there wrong or if im good and should just run them
Run server: @echo off color 07 title Trixscape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
compiler: @echo off COLOR 07 echo Compiling... title TrixScape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
thanks in advance
*Crystal Bow*

item.title: Quick question about putting up my server
item.dc:creator: @Crystal_bow Crystal bow
item.description:
@Crystal_bow wrote:

ok i have all the java and the no ip put i need to know what codes to put in my run server and compiler my ip is trixscape.no-ip.info here is that i have in compiler and run server tell me if there wrong or if im good and should just run them

Run server:
@echo off
color 07
title Trixscape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

compiler:
@echo off
COLOR 07
echo Compiling…
title TrixScape Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

thanks in advance

Crystal Bow

Read full topic
item.source: Quick question about putting up my server
